title: Insurance Act 1994 (No. 16 of 1994) (substituted by section 8 of the Health
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Insurance Act 1994
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Insurance Act 1994 

(Section 11E(3)) Regulations 2013 (Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 April 2020. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health insurance act 1994 (section 11e(3)) regulation 2013 (amendment) regulation 2020 (2) regulation shall come operation 1 april 2020 interpretation

title: Insurance Act 1994 (No. 16 of 1994) (substituted by section 8 of the Health
heading: (This note is not part of the Regulations and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Regulations and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations are made by The Health Insurance Authority pursuant to 
Section 11E(3) of the Health Insurance Act 1994, as inserted by section 15 of 
the Health Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012 and amend the Schedule to the 
Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section 11E(3)) Regulations 2013.
